title: Frontend Developer
description: Looking for a talented Frontend Developer skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: As a Frontend Developer at Tech Innovators, you will work closely with the design and backend teams to build engaging user experiences using React or Vue.js. Benefits include health insurance and remote working flexibility.

title: Backend Developer
description: Experienced Backend Developer required for developing scalable APIs and server-side logic.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Join Data Solutions Inc. as a Backend Developer, responsible for building APIs and managing databases. Required skills include Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Experience with AWS or GCP is a plus.

title: Fullstack Developer
description: Looking for a versatile Fullstack Developer with strong skills in both front-end and back-end development.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Innovative Systems is seeking a part-time Fullstack Developer skilled in React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. The role involves working on e-commerce platforms and data analytics tools.

title: Vanilla JavaScript Developer
description: Seeking a Vanilla JavaScript Developer for building performance-optimized web applications.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: As a Vanilla JavaScript Developer, you will create lightweight, high-performance web apps. Proficiency in core JavaScript (ES6+), DOM manipulation, and progressive web apps is required.

title: Web Designer
description: Creative Web Designer required to design stunning, responsive websites for various clients.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Design websites, landing pages, and digital interfaces at Creative Studio. Experience with Adobe XD, Figma, and Sketch required, with basic front-end skills (HTML/CSS) being a plus.

title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Junior Frontend Developer internship available for those with a passion for web technologies and a strong willingness to learn.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Join our team as a Junior Frontend Developer intern. You will work on basic web development tasks using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, gaining hands-on experience in modern web development frameworks.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description: Senior Fullstack Developer with 5+ years of experience in both frontend and backend required.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Work on complex web applications, build scalable backends, and create dynamic user interfaces. Proficiency in React, Node.js, and microservices architecture is necessary.

title: JavaScript Developer
description: WordPress Developer required for creating custom themes and plugins for various clients.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: As a freelance WordPress Developer, you will develop and customize WordPress themes, plugins, and integrations. Experience in PHP, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript is required.

title: UI/UX web Designer
description: UI/UX Designer needed to create user-centric designs and wireframes for web and mobile applications.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Work on designing user-friendly interfaces and improving user experience for web and mobile apps. Tools such as Figma and Adobe XD are a must. A portfolio showcasing design projects is required.

title: Backend Developer (Python)
description: Backend Developer with expertise in Python and Django/Flask to build REST APIs and scalable systems.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: TechHub Inc. is looking for a Backend Developer who is experienced in Python and building APIs with Django or Flask. You will work on designing and optimizing scalable services for cloud platforms.

title: Senior Vue Developer
description: We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to join our team in Boston, MA. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience working with modern JavaScript frameworks such as Vue or Angular.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: NewTek Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in web development and digital solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and services to our clients while fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.

title: Front-End Engineer (Vue)
description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in sunny Miami, FL. We are looking for a motivated individual with a passion for crafting beautiful and responsive web applications. Experience with UI/UX design principles and a strong attention to detail are highly desirable.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Veneer Solutions is a creative agency specializing in digital design and development. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity and innovation to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

title: Vue.js Developer
description: Are you passionate about front-end development? Join our team in vibrant Brooklyn, NY, and work on exciting projects that make a difference. We offer competitive compensation and a collaborative work environment where your ideas are valued.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Dolor Cloud is a leading technology company specializing in digital solutions for businesses of all sizes. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, we are committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services.

title: Vue Front-End Developer
description: Join our team as a Part-Time Front-End Developer in beautiful Pheonix, AZ. We are looking for a self-motivated individual with a passion for creating engaging user experiences. This position offers flexible hours and the opportunity to work remotely.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Alpha Elite is a dynamic startup specializing in digital marketing and web development. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where creativity and innovation thrive.

title: Full Stack Vue Developer
description: Exciting opportunity for a Full-Time Front-End Developer in bustling Atlanta, GA. We are seeking a talented individual with a passion for building elegant and scalable web applications. Join our team and make an impact!

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Browning Technologies is a rapidly growing technology company specializing in e-commerce solutions. We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment where employees are encouraged to think creatively and innovate.

title: Vue Native Developer
description: Join our team as a Front-End Developer in beautiful Portland, OR. We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic individual to help us create innovative web solutions. Competitive salary and great benefits package available.

detailedDescription.moreDetails: Port Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in software development and digital marketing. We are committed to providing our clients with cutting-edge solutions and our employees with a supportive and rewarding work environment.
